name: Wellbeing & Health
description: Focused on improving quality of life through affecting the physical, psychological, environmental and social determinants of health and wellbeing.

name: Spirituality & Religion
description: Focused on the world beyond the material and the rational.

name: Development & Growth
description: Focused on fostering personal development and growth in emotional, psychological, social and other internal capacities.

name: Business & Work
description: Focused on innovating the world of work, including through new methods and approaches to business and organisational mamagement.

name: Community
description: Focused on the role of community in human life and the fostering human flourishing, and approaches to building, sustianing and governing communities.

name: Arts & Culture
description: Focused on the role and use of arts and culture in fostering social change.

name: Ecology & Environment
description: Focused on issues relating to the environment, including climate change but also nature more broadly and human relationships to it.

name: Politics & Policy
description: Focused on engaging with the mainstream politics, creating policies and innovating political processes and systems.

name: Technology & Blockchain
description: Focused on the use of technological innovation, including blockchain, to foster social change and support new social systems.

name: Governance & Institutions
description: Focused on devising new forms of governance and institutions to support alternative social paradigms.

name: Science
description: Focused on the use of scientific methods and scientific knowledge to support social change and underpin new social paradigms.
